revised_title: Gauge Symmetry in String Theory: Frenkel-Kac-Segal Mechanism and Conformal Field Theory
tldr: This article discusses the incorporation of gauge symmetry into string theory using the Frenkel-Kac-Segal mechanism, which is intrinsically quantum mechanical. It also explores the connection between conformal field theory and string theory, emphasizing the importance of understanding conformal field theory for further advancements in string theory.
